results.title: Bitcoin Price, BTC Price, Live Charts, and Marketcap: bitcoin price usd ...
results.snippet: The price of Bitcoin has increased by 0.36% in the last hour and decreased by 2.87% in the past 24 hours. Bitcoin's price has also fallen by 2.76% in the past week. The current price is $79,467.30 per BTC with a 24-hour trading volume of $54.06B. Currently, Bitcoin is valued at 27.11% below its all time high of $109,026.02.
